text: Opening
trans: 开端

text: Amidst a raging blizzard, the swordswoman Beatrix catches sight of the Odajumoki, a fearsome Harvin gang, beating on a pair of settlers. She approaches them and demands to be taken to their hideout.
trans: 在一片呼啸的暴风雪之中，女剑士贝阿朵莉切看到了一伙可怕的哈文族团体，“小鸭摩托帮”（オダヅモッキー・ギャングスタ）；这群人正在教训一对定居者。她靠近了这群帮派成员，并要求后者将自己带到他们的据点。

text: In the grip of midwinter, nearly entombed beneath immense snowdrifts is the frigid landscape of North Vast.
trans: 隆冬时节，北方荒原的寒冷地带几乎完全被巨大的雪堆掩埋。

text: Known since long ago as the White Continent, this is a world where even now civilization has yet to flourish and silence reigns.
trans: 此地自长久以前就被认知为“白之大陆”，是一个直到现在尚无文明兴盛、由寂静支配的世界。

text: Into this unforgiving climate where no trace of life can be found, a pair of resolute but foolhardy settlers venture forth.
trans: 在这寻不到任何生命迹象的恶劣气候中，一对坚决而鲁莽的定居者向前跋涉。

name: Settler 1/定居者1
text: Brr... So cold! So cold, but... so vast!
trans: 呃啊啊……太冷了！这么冷，但……这么辽阔！

name: Settler 2/定居者2
text: Brrr... Leaving a vast expanse like this to the elements is such a waste! We can claim this land as our own!
trans: 啊……把如此广阔的土地撂荒真是一种浪费！我们可以把这片土地据为己有！

name: Settler 1/定居者1
text: Splendid idea! From now we reign over this land!
trans: 绝妙的点子！从现在开始我们将统治这片土地！

text: The two settlers are in high spirits. They came from far, far away to settle this untamed land.
trans: 定居者们情绪高涨。他们自很远、很远的地方前来这尚未开发的土地定居。

name: Settler 2/定居者2
text: An expanse as vast as this... Hyehehe, we could sell this land to another country for piles of rupies—huh?
trans: 如此辽阔……嘿嘿，我们可以把这块地卖给别的国家，换来成堆的卢比——哈？

name: Settler 2/定居者2
text: Did you hear that just now?
trans: 你刚刚听见那个了吗？

name: Ruffians/小混混们
text: Hyaaah!
trans: （怪叫声）

name: Silver-Haired Youth
text: Hyaaa! Yahaaa!
trans: （怪叫声）

name: Settler 2/定居者2
text: Wh-who are these guys?
trans: 这，这些家伙是什么人？

name: Ruffian 1/小混混1
text: Hiiyaaa! You claim this land to be yours? Who do you punks think you are!
trans: （怪叫声）你们说这片土地是你们的？\n你们以为自己是什么货色！

name: Ruffian 2/小混混2
text: Hyehe, what were you prattling on about? This island is ours!
trans: 呵呵，你们在说什么胡话！这个岛是我们的！

name: Ruffian 3/小混混3
text: Gyahaha! You'd better think again! We don't like anyone threatening our freedom!
trans: （怪叫声）你们最好再想想！我们不喜欢任何人威胁到我们的自由！

name: Settler 2/定居者2
text: Yikes...
trans: 呜哇……

name: Ruffian 2/小混混2
text: Take that! And that! Drop-kick!\nTie them up! For our freeedom!
trans: 尝尝那个！还有那个！飞踢！\n把他们绑起来！为了我们的自由！

name: Settler 1/定居者1
text: Ar-aaargh! Stop, please!
trans: （惊恐的叫声）停下来，求你了！

name: Settler 1/定居者1
text: Ack!
trans: 哇啊！

name: Ruffian 1/小混混1
text: No one! Threatens! Our! Father's! Freeeedom!
trans: 没有人！能！威胁！我们的！父的！自——由！

name: Ruffians/小混混们
text: Hiiyaaa! Yahaaa!
trans: （怪叫声）

name: Silver-Haired Youth/银发青年
text: Freedom?
trans: 自由？

name: Silver-Haired Youth/银发青年
text: Hey, you guys. I need to ask, but are we really, uh, free?
trans: 嘿，大家。我想问问，但我们真的，呃，自由吗？

name: Ruffian 2/小混混2
text: What? Well, of course we are! Didn't Allfather grant us the freedom to rampage across this land?
trans: 啥？好吧，我们当然是自由的？难道全父没有给我们在这片土地上肆意妄为的自由（奔放に暴れ回れる自由；the freedom to rampage）吗？

name: Silver-Haired Youth/银发青年
text: Of course, yeah! Hehe, it's not like us geniuses to worry about stuff! For now let's give these guys a good beating!
trans: 当然，好耶！嘿嘿，这不像是我们这种天才会担心的事儿！现在就让我们好好教训下这些家伙！

name: Ruffians/小混混们
text: For freeedom!
trans: 为了自由！

name: Settlers/定居者们
text: Aaargh!
trans: 哇啊！

text: Screams of unbearable anguish ring out, and the pure white snow is splattered vivid red.
trans: 出于无法忍受的痛苦的尖叫声响起，纯白的雪被溅上了鲜艳的红色。

text: From a faraway vantage point, an observer watches this brutal punishment.
trans: 一位观察者正从远处的制高点观看这场暴行。

name: Swordswoman/女剑士
text: How horrible... They didn't show him any mercy...
trans: 多么可怕……他们对他毫不留情……

name: Swordswoman/女剑士
text: Whoever heard of such a thing, the freedom to rampage...
trans: 谁听说过这种事情，肆意妄为的自由……

name: Swordswoman/女剑士
text: Those outlaws are definitely the Odajumoki I was told about.
trans: 这些无法之辈肯定就是我听说过的“小鸭摩托帮”（オダヅモッキー・ギャングスタ）。

name: Swordswoman/女剑士
text: Hehe, looks like the intel I picked up was no lie.
trans: 呵呵，看起来我获得的情报不是个谎言。

text: The swordswoman speaks triumphantly and starts to advance toward the members of the so-called Odajumoki Gang.
trans: <span class='scene-font-katari'>女剑士得意洋洋地说道，并开始向所谓的“小鸭摩托帮”的成员靠近。

name: Swordswoman/女剑士
text: Oi, you there! You've had your fun now.
trans: 喂，那边的家伙！你们正玩的挺高兴啊。

name: Ruffian 3/小混混3
text: Huh? And who are you? Ain't never seen you 'round these parts!
trans: 哈？你谁？从没在这附近看到过你！

name: Ruffian 2/小混混2
text: My, my, isn't she adorable? Hyehe, let me get a closer look at you, missy!
trans: 天哪，她不是挺可爱的吗？嘻嘻，小妞，让我仔细看看你！

name: Ruffian 1/小混混1
text: Yeah, why not come spend some time with us! Nyehehehe!
trans: 对的，为什么不和我们一起耍耍！（怪笑声）

name: Swordswoman/女剑士
text: Humph, who the hell would want to spend time with you lowlives?
trans: 哼哼，谁他妈会愿意和你们这些下等人在一起？

name: Swordswoman/女剑士
text: Actually there is something I'd like to talk to you about. Something you'll wanna hear.
trans: 事实上我有件事想和你们谈谈。你们会想听听的。

name: Ruffian 1/小混混1
text: Oh? Tell us more.\nHehehe, let's see what she has to say for herself.
trans: 哦？说来听听。\n嘿嘿嘿，让我们看看她有什么要说的。

name: Swordswoman/女剑士
text: Not so fast. Not here. Take me to your hideout.
trans: 别这么急。别在这说。带我去你们的藏身处。

name: Swordswoman/女剑士
text: There we'll be able to talk without interruptions...
trans: 在那儿我们可以畅所欲言……
scene_evt151231_cp0_q1_s10
Ἀκρασία
